document.full_text: ireland's government moved on monday to quash speculation it would be forced to seek a second eu-imf bailout and said it would make a tentative return to international debt markets in the final quarter of next year.
document.title: ireland rules out second bailout; to test market in 2012
lines_and_colors: ireland's government moved on monday to quash speculation it would be forced to seek a second eu-imf bailout and said it would make a tentative return to international debt markets in the final quarter of next year.
